data.title: Location
data.meta_description: Our global reach combines with local support to bring customers the best sales, customer support and service possible.
data.text:
Global Reach. Local Support.

Our global reach combines with local support to bring customers the best sales, customer support and service possible. It's how we do our part to help keep kitchens around the world running smoothly.

We have a dedicated dealer/sales network ready to assist you in identifying the best foodservice and food retail equipment based on your concept, footprint, menu and the volume of your operation.

Backed by the industry’s only network of factory-trained service technicians, we’re your local, regional, and national partner for food equipment service. Wherever you are and whatever you need—installation support, maintenance, genuine OEM parts—we’re nearby to help.

Hobart has manufacturing operations in the United States, Brazil, Canada, China, France, Germany, Italy, and the United Kingdom. Our headquarters is located in Troy, Ohio, USA.

HEADQUARTERS

Troy, Ohio

701 South Ridge Avenue

Troy, Ohio 45374, USA

Manufacturing Facilities in the u.s. and Canada:

Troy, Ohio

Home to our manufacturing facilities specializing in dishwashing and cooking equipment.

Troy, Ohio

Home to our manufacturing facilities specializing in cooking equipment.

Hillsboro, Ohio

Home to our manufacturing facilities specializing in food preparation equipment as well as weighing and wrapping equipment.

Danville, Kentucky

Home to our manufacturing facilities specializing in dishwashing equipment.

Owen Sound, Canada

Home to our manufacturing facilities specializing in dishwashing equipment.

Fort Worth, Texas

Home of Traulsen, specializing in premium refrigeration equipment.

Orting, Washington

Home of Baxter, specializing in premium cooking and baking equipment.

Baltimore, Maryland

Home of Vulcan, specializing in premium cooking equipment.

Charlotte, North Carolina

Home of Vulcan, specializing in premium cooking equipment.
